content: कोपन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कुप्-ताच्छील्ये युच्] {@--1@} Passionate, irascible, angry. {@--2@} Causing anger. {@--3@} Irritating, causing morbid disorder of the humours of the body. --नं Becoming angry. --ना A passionate or angry woman; कयासि कामिन् सुरतापराधात् पादानतः कोपनयाऽ वधूतः <ls>Ku. 3. 8</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 65.</ls>
